translation.text: Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.

NCS  train #102 scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 7:38 AM, may be operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule, due to emergency track repairs. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
BNSF  train #1306, scheduled to depart Aurora at 6:47 AM, will not operate due to mechanical problems. Train #1228, scheduled to depart Aurora at 7:02 AM will accommodate  passengers.
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
RI East Elevator at Joliet Out of Service
The Joliet east elevator is out of service. Customers can use New Lenox or Mokena as alternate boarding stations.
As a Reminder, On Monday, January 19, (Martin Luther King Jr. Day) Metra will operate a regular weekday schedule.
As a reminder, on Monday, January 19, (Martin Luther King Jr. Day) Metra will operate a regular weekday schedule.
Train 28, scheduled to depart La Fox at 6:59 a.m., will not operate due to operational issues. Train 30, Scheduled to depart Elburn at 7:05 a.m., will accommodate passengers.

MDN train #2106 scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 7:13 AM, may be operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule, due to operational issues. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.

NCS train #100 scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 6:55 AM, may be operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule, due to  emergency track repairs. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.

Train #604 scheduled to depart Crystal Lake at 4:45 AM will not operate due to operational issues. Train #606 scheduled to depart Crystal Lake at 5:15 AM will accommodate passengers. Visit metratracker.com for train location. Updated 5:27 AM
The 55th/56th/57th Street West elevator is back in service.
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
NCS Inbound and Outbound trains Delays
NCS inbound and outbound trains may be operating up to 35 minutes behind schedule due to emergency track repairs near Grayslake.  Please visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.
Train #611 scheduled to depart Chicago at 6:35 AM will not operate due to operational issues. Trains #613, #615, and #617 will accommodate passengers. Visit metratracker.com for train location.
